definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Pithom, P(e)iqw, A Piqwm (Egypt. Patum, Per-Atum, house of (god) Atum) one of the [[עָרֵי מִסְכְּנוֹת]] built by Isr. for Pharaoh Ex 1:11; identif. by Naville with Tel el-Maskhûta, near E. end of Wady Tumilat, Naville:Pithom, 1885 Di-Ry:ad loc. Di:SBAk, 1885, 889 ff. Bäd:Egypt (4). 159.
